short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An free ai art generator，powerd by Midjourney and other AI art models, with leading AI technology, add inspiration to the creation.
short.zh_CN,zh_TW: 免费AI艺术图像生成工具，输入文本描述即可生成高质量图像，内置Midjourney等丰富的AI绘画模型，用多元化的风格和领先的人工智能技术，为创作增添灵感。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ArtGenius, an image creation tool that utilizes artificial intelligence technology, not only mimics a variety of painting styles, but also recognizes scenes and objects in text to generate high-quality, photorealistic images. What makes it unique is that you can easily create a wide range of stunning visual images without having specialized drawing skills. 🚀🚀🚀

ArtGenius is a free ai art generator with built-in multiple image models such as Midjourney, Stable Diffusion and DALL·E. unleash artistic brilliance without any cost, turning your ideas into captivating visual wonders! 🚀🚀🚀

🌟Application Scenarios🌟
ArtGenius has a wide range of application scenarios. From individual hobbyists to professional designers, whether it is for personal creativity, business promotion, or education and training, you can find great value in the image generator. It can be used to create artworks, promotional posters, product design, and even virtual reality and game development.

🌟 Usage🌟.
 ArtGenius is very simple and intuitive to use. Simply upload or enter a relevant reference image or description, select the desired painting style or theme, adjust the parameters (if needed) and click Generate.ArtGenius will generate a high-quality image that meets the user's needs in a matter of seconds. In addition, you can perform live preview and editing to ensure that the image is exactly as expected. 👀👀👀

🌟Functional features🌟
1. Diversified Image Generation: ArtGenius has built-in Midjournry, SDXL, secondary and other AI painting models, covering a wide range of painting styles, including realistic, oil painting, watercolor, realism, animation and so on, to inspire your unlimited creativity. 🤳
2. Text Recognition: able to accurately recognize scenes and objects in text descriptions, you only need to enter a simple description to generate realistic and detailed pictures. 🎨
3. Image Recognition: supports uploading reference images, and generates similar style images by recognizing images and style features through advanced AI vision algorithms. 🎯
4. Personalized Adjustment: Provide rich parameter adjustment function, which can customize the details of image generation according to your needs. 💎
5. Paint Redraw: You can edit the generated pictures, delete unwanted contents on the pictures, or enter the redraw description spell to regenerate the contents you want to ensure a perfect creation. 🎯
6. Lossless Zoom: With Lossless Zoom, you can convert a low-resolution image into a high-definition image, preserving the clarity of details. 🚀
7. Interactive operation: simple and intuitive interface design, easy to operate, no need to worry about the level of computer skills, even a novice can get started quickly. 💇‍♂️
8. Continuous updating: Through continuous updating and optimization of functions, the number of image models is increased, and the quality and diversity of generated images are improved. 👀
9. History Favorites: Support saving 50 history records, you can view, favorite, edit and other operations in the history records to improve your use of the scene and process. 🌐
10. Data Security Protection: ArtGenius promises to strictly protect your data, focusing on privacy and security to ensure the safety of your information. 📢

ArtGenius not only represents a great breakthrough of artificial intelligence technology in the field of art creation, but also provides a brand new possibility for image creation. In this era of digitization and informationization, ArtGenius brings you unlimited creativity and enhances your creation and work efficiency. By combining artificial intelligence and image generation technology, ArtGenius creates a world of unlimited creativity for you, so that everyone can be a source of creativity.🚀🚀🚀
long.zh_CN,zh_TW:
ArtGenius，是一款利用人工智能技术的图像创作工具，它不仅能够模仿各种绘画风格，而且能够识别文本中的场景与物体，生成高质量、逼真度极高的图像。其独特之处在于，您可以在不具备专业绘画技能的情况下，轻松地创作出各种惊艳的视觉图像。🚀🚀🚀

ArtGenius专注AI图像生成，内置Midjourney，Stable Diffusion和DALL·E等多种图像模型，两步快速得到创意图像，适用于艺术设计、品牌推广、广告创意、电商展示等领域。🚀🚀🚀

🌟应用场景🌟
ArtGenius的应用场景十分广泛。从个人爱好者到专业设计师，无论是为了个人创意、商业宣传、还是教育培训，都能在图像生成器中找到巨大的价值。它可以用于制作艺术作品、宣传海报、产品设计、甚至是虚拟现实与游戏开发。

🌟使用方法🌟
 ArtGenius使用非常简单直观。只需上传或输入相关的参考图像或描述，选择所需的绘画风格或主题，调整参数（如果需要的话），然后点击生成。ArtGenius将会在几秒钟内生成一张符合用户需求的高质量图像。此外，您还可以进行实时预览和编辑，以确保图像完全符合预期。👀👀👀

🌟功能特点🌟
1. 多样化图像生成： ArtGenius内置Midjournry、SDXL、二次元等多种AI绘画模型，涵盖了多种绘画风格，包括写实、油画、水彩、写实、动漫等，激发您的无限创意。🤳
2. 文本识别：能够准确识别文本描述中的场景与物体，您只需要输入简单的描述，即可生成逼真细致的图片。🎨
3. 图像识别：支持上传参考图片，通过先进的AI视觉算法识别图像和风格特征，生成相似风格图片。🎯
4. 个性化调整：提供丰富的参数调节功能，可以根据您的需求定制图片生成细节。💎
5. 涂抹重绘：您可以对生成的图片进行编辑，删除图片上不需要的内容，或者输入重绘描述咒语，重新生成您想要的内容，确保完美创作。🎯
6. 无损放大：使用无损放大，您可以将低分辨率图像转换为高清图像，保持细节清晰度。🚀
7. 交互式操作：简单直观的界面设计，易于操作，无需担心电脑技术水平，小白也可快速上手。💇‍♂️
8. 持续更新：通过持续更新优化功能，增加图像模型数量，提升生成图像的质量和多样性。👀
9. 历史收藏：支持保存50条历史记录，您可以在历史记录中进行查看、收藏、编辑等操作，完善您的使用场景和流程。🌐
10. 数据安全保护： ArtGenius承诺严格保护您的数据，注重隐私安全，确保您的信息安全性。📢
ArtGenius不仅代表了人工智能技术在艺术创作领域的巨大突破，更是为图像创作提供了一种全新的可能性。在这个数字化、信息化的时代，ArtGenius为您带来无限的创意，提升您的创作和工作效率。通过结合人工智能与图像生成技术，ArtGenius为您创造了一个无限创意的世界，让每个人都能成为创意的源泉。
